entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and local blowing snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature steady near zero.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 40%
